title: UnitType
description: Defines the unit to be used for price, quantity, or other purposes

capacityUnit.description: Provides an enumerated value for a capacity unit, generally used in the context of defining quantities for commodities.

weatherUnit.description: Provides an enumerated values for a weather unit, generally used in the context of defining quantities for commodities.

financialUnit.description: Provides an enumerated value for financial units, generally used in the context of defining quantities for securities.

currency.description: Defines the currency to be used as a unit for a price, quantity, or other purpose.
